II. Purpose of Addendum
The addendum was completed due to a modification in terms for the agency,
specifically the addition of Supervise Independent Living.
III. Methodology
The addition of the program for independent living was discussed with the Program
Director. All applicable program statements, policies, and procedures were reviewed.
The agency has had and independent living program in the past; and little has changed
with regard to program details.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
All program statements, policies, and procedures were found to be compliant with
licensing rules and contract requirements. The agency has sufficient staffing to carry
out the responsibilities of this program; and the intention of the program is to provide
continuity of care as well as to service a wider population.
V. Recommendation
The recommendation is to continue the agency’s regular license, with the modification
to add the term of Supervise Independent Living.
